summary: PostUnlockHeader was changed to render an logo pointing at /assets/file_000000007b7c7206b4fb54a3c1ce9985.png with responsive sizing, but the diff does not add the required uploaded image assets to the frontend, and it introduces additional decorative UI/styling not requested (background flourish, gradients, hearts, subtitle).

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the two uploaded image files to the frontend static assets and reference the selected one from the post-unlock header component. Uploaded files: `file_000000007b7c7206b4fb54a3c1ce9985.png`, `file_00000000b7ac720681a2c7cc9dc00ef9 (1).jpg`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added asset files ("Added: 0" / "ADDED FILES: none"), so there is no evidence the uploaded images were actually added as static frontend assets. Only a reference path was added in the header.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a decorative background flourish image and gradient overlay behind the header content (references /assets/generated/romantic-header-flourish.dim_1200x300.png).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/REQ-2; request was limited to replacing the header logo.

hallucinated_features.description: Added pulsing heart icons around the heading via lucide-react and additional romantic subtitle text (“A world of love, joy & promises”).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; the non-goals explicitly discourage changing content beyond the header logo replacement.

hallucinated_features.description: Added animated glow/pulse styling around the logo container (blur, animate-pulse, drop-shadow).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; styling changes beyond making the logo responsive were not part of requirements.
